name: AS Scroll to top
author: Ashikur Rahman

sections.description:
AS Scroll To Top is a plugin that let you add a nice Scroll To Top button to your WordPress blog.

Here Is the Demo of it: http://ashik.freeserver.me/as-scroll-to-top/

Features:
1. Just plug and play.
2. Use 100’s of icons to your button.
3. change color of your button with css.
4. change size of your button with css. (For sizing your button use font size and line height css property)
5. Just write Your Icon name to Change icon of your button. You can Get icons name Here

Ask any type of Questions Here

Follow Me on Social Networks:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ashikur12

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ashikur1993
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Ask any type of Questions Here
Will be answered ASAP.

Thank You

short_description: This plugin will add a nice scroll to top button to your website. It has a nice option panel. you can change button's color button's icon.
